testValidSquares() - Method in class test.model.pieces.FlawedKingTest
We have some important things to test to see if validSquares() works: - That it doesn't returns squares past the edges - That it ignores squares pieces of the same color are on - That it doesn't ignore squares with pieces of a different color on them For this purpose we have 3 different pieces we will check.

turnPanel - Variable in class view.ChessApplicationWindow
 
TurnPanel - Class in view
A GUI panel that displays whose turn it is in a game of simplified chess: it paints its area black if it is Black's turn to move; white if it is White's turn.
